original_title: 恵比寿マスカッツ殺人事件~歌って踊って殺されて~THE 1st STAGE
overview: The first concert held at SHIBUYA AX on Saturday, July 10, 2010 was filmed and this video captures the excitement of the first concert, in which the group sang four of their own songs. The 36 members, including some of the graduating members, joined the audience on stage for tears and laughter.
title: Ebisu Muscats Murder Case ~Singing, Dancing and Getting Killed~ the 1st STAGE
